Benchmark.Name: General Office

Options.Option: Offices - mechanically ventilated and/or air conditioned

Benchmark.PrimaryMetric: Gross floor area measured as RICS Gross Internal Area (GIA)
Benchmark.ApprovedAlternateMetric: Net Lettable Area (NLA) measured as RICS
Benchmark.DefinitionOfHoursPerWeekInThisSector: Total equivalent hours of full use/occupancy per year
